alert.note: Alert for Lake Of The Woods; Roseau (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 16 at 2:27AM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of eastern Roseau and west central Lake of the Woods Counties through 330 AM CDT... At 226 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Pencer, or 11 miles southeast of Roseau, moving east at 25 mph. Other thunderstorms are in the area as well producing heavy rain. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Williams, Roosevelt, Salol, Swift, Hayes Lake State Park, Pencer and Graceton. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
